resources.string: Fill remaining item with X for completed line
First playing after install, update can take a minute
This tutorial will show you how to play this game.\nPress Next button to go to next page.
The number 3 at right upper side of the board shows you that the right column contains three continuous filled cell.
We clicked three cells so they were filled.\nYou can see the number 3 changed to gray color.\nIt means that the number is completed.
Now we will complete the number 2 at the left upper side.\nLikewise, it means two continuous cells should be filled.
To fill who continuous cells, the middle cell should be filled.\nWe filled the middle cell and completed the number 2.

We will check the middle column.
There are two numbers whose value is 1. It means we should fill one cell and make margin between the next filled cell.
Top cell is already filled so the middle cell shouldn't be filled.
To indicate that the cell shouldn't be filled, click the 'O' button so the button was changed to 'X' button.
We clicked the middle cell and so the cell now shows \'X\'.\nYou don\'t have to fill that X sign.\nBut you can check that X sign for your convenience.
I checked \'X\' sign at the bottom cell for mistake.\nIf you make mistake, you can get back by pressing \'prev\' button.
After we press the button, it got back and the number on that button was changed.\nYou can get back or go next again by pressing \'prev\' button or \'next\' button.

You can use hint by pressing \'hint\' button.\nBy pressing the \'hint\' button at the right side, the \'toggle\' button at the center shows hint icon.\nIf you click the cells on the board at this status, you can get the correct result of that cell.

After clicking the bottom cell, it was filled. The cell was to be filled.\nIn game, if you use hint, it is saved and won\'t be changed for any clicking.\nUse hint carefully because you can get only one hint per day.
The tutorial is ended.\nSelect a puzzle and enjoy the game.
